name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】最初で最後の #かなけん3DLIVE !!【天音かなた、沙花叉クロヱ、AZKi  ⧸ ホロライブ】 [IhJW-YPJ-z0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: AZKi, Amane Kanata, and Sakamata Chloe continue their performance of 'No Sun Cross'.
The trio begins their performance of 'World is Mine'.

subtitles.original: 君がいないなら
subtitles.english: If you are not here

subtitles.original: 意味なんてなくなるから
subtitles.english: Then everything loses its meaning

subtitles.original: 人は全部冷えればいい
subtitles.english: So everyone should just turn cold

subtitles.original: 愛がなくなれば
subtitles.english: If love disappears

subtitles.original: 心だっていらないから
subtitles.english: Then I don't even need a heart

subtitles.original: この世界も消えてしまえ
subtitles.english: This world should just vanish as well

subtitles.original: ずっと苦しかった
subtitles.english: I've been suffering for a long time

subtitles.original: 命がけの出会い
subtitles.english: A life-risking encounter

subtitles.original: もがくように夢見た
subtitles.english: I dreamed as if struggling

subtitles.original: 闇雲に手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out blindly

subtitles.original: そのまでに気づきたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to realize it by then

subtitles.original: 君と虹を架けたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to build a rainbow with you

subtitles.original: 誰か夜明けの感傷で
subtitles.english: Someone, with the sentiment of dawn

subtitles.original: ぎゅっと抱いてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you hold me tight?

subtitles.original: 夢が軌道に弾かれて
subtitles.english: Dreams were bounced off their orbit

subtitles.original: 飛び散るだけの愛の涙
subtitles.english: Only tears of love scattering

subtitles.original: それがむき出しの痛みでもいい
subtitles.english: Even if it's raw pain, it's fine

subtitles.original: 宿命に呼び戻された
subtitles.english: Called back by destiny

subtitles.original: 北極星が泣いている
subtitles.english: The North Star is crying

subtitles.original: どうせ見えない行方なら
subtitles.english: If the destination is invisible anyway

subtitles.original: 君を包むまで愛して
subtitles.english: I'll love you until I envelop you

subtitles.original: 死にたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to die

subtitles.original: そして始まるのだ
subtitles.english: And so it begins

subtitles.original: 命がけの終わり
subtitles.english: A life-risking end

subtitles.original: 戦うように愛した
subtitles.english: I loved as if fighting

subtitles.original: ぐしゃぐしゃに夢を蹴った
subtitles.english: I kicked my dreams into a mess

subtitles.original: その星に果てたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to perish on that star

subtitles.original: 君の空咲きたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to bloom in your sky

subtitles.original: 誰か虚空の輪郭を
subtitles.english: Someone, the outline of the void

subtitles.original: そっとなでてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you gently stroke it?

subtitles.original: 時の波にかき消されて
subtitles.english: Drowned out by the waves of time

subtitles.original: 救えなかった愛の言葉
subtitles.english: Words of love that couldn't be saved

subtitles.original: だからもう一度答えが欲しい
subtitles.english: So I want an answer once more

subtitles.original: 宿命に張り付けられた
subtitles.english: Crucified to destiny

subtitles.original: 北極星が燃えている
subtitles.english: The North Star is burning

subtitles.original: 君を焼きしめて凍らした
subtitles.english: I scorched you and made you freeze

subtitles.original: なのに可憐に笑う此処
subtitles.english: Yet here you laugh so prettily

subtitles.original: 君を焼きしめて凍らした
subtitles.english: I scorched you and made you freeze

subtitles.original: なのに可憐に笑う此処
subtitles.english: Yet here you laugh so prettily

subtitles.original: 好きだったよ
subtitles.english: I loved you

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world

subtitles.original: そういう扱い心得て
subtitles.english: Understand that's how you should treat me

subtitles.original: よね！
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original:
ワールドイズマイン
WORLD IS MINE
作詞・作曲・編曲：ryo
subtitles.english:
World is Mine
WORLD IS MINE
Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: ryo

subtitles.original: その一、いつもと違う髪型に気が付くこと
subtitles.english: Number one: notice when my hairstyle is different from usual

subtitles.original: その二、ちゃんと靴まで見ること、いいね？
subtitles.english: Number two: make sure you look down to my shoes, okay?

subtitles.original: その三、私の一言には三つの言葉で返事すること
subtitles.english: Number three: reply to every word of mine with three of yours

subtitles.original: わかったら右手がお留守なのを
subtitles.english: If you understand, then do something about

subtitles.original: なんとかして！
subtitles.english: my neglected right hand!

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything

subtitles.original: 君に心から思ってほしいの、かわいいって
subtitles.english: I just want you to think from your heart that I'm cute
